interpretation:
The Circled M card represents movement and progress. It signifies a time of forward momentum, where you are making strides towards your goals. This card can also represent communication, as the letter "M" is often associated with messaging and connecting with others. 

When this card appears in a reading, it may be a sign that you need to take action and keep moving forward. It could be a time to focus on your goals and make strides towards achieving them. This card also encourages you to communicate with others and seek out new connections.

Overall, the Circled M card is a symbol of progress, momentum, and communication. It reminds us to keep moving forward and stay connected with those around us.
